item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Its that time of year to Practice Self and Assisted Rescues prior to our OCEAN EVENTS.

Weather:

http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code.cgi?Submit=Go&sta=KHFD&state=CT

This event will have you practice Paddle Float Re-Entry and some assisted rescues with each other

Wear fast draining cloths because you will get wet..have some dry clothes ready for the Pot luck BBQ afterward.

-----------------------------------------------

Getting to the Boat Launch area: 
There is a easy to reach boat launch right off of rte 44 in Bolton that has plenty of parking and PortoPotties (they should be there by then if not , Pee in the water..) . Further to the east on the lake is a beach area that would be an excellent place to sit in the sun .

Directions: to the boat launch.

Use the apx address for your GPs to get you close enough #1050 Boston Tpk Bolton


Rte 384 heading East to Bolton Notch

Continue on Rte 44 E (left part of fork) ...rte 6 is to the right 
There is a traffic light with a post office and a small shopping area to the right, continue to the next light.

The next light has the boat launch to the left and a church to the right. (South street intersection) 
Enter the boat launch area.


PLEASE LEAVE THE LAUNCHING CIRCLE OPEN after unloading AND PARK ON THE DESIGNATED SIDE AREAS, the DEP cops show up all the time it seems. They are looking to make some money.

If you need help during unloading we will always help you -- but we always don't know if you need help,   so ask anyone to help you if you need it.

I also will have a kayak wheel thing to make transport easier if needed..

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THEN JOIN US FOR THE SOCIALIZATION TIME AFTER AT THE  POT LUCK BARBIE-Q NEARBY.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

I will do a Recreation Kayak vs Compartmentalized Kayak demonstration so you will understand the need to be careful for this event and all of the seasons we will be paddling. Its mostly to illiustrate what to buy so your future will be safer.

 

"DEPUTY---HELP HELP SINKING IN THE CRICK MUD"...

-------------------------------------------------

Then its a POT LUCK BARBIE-Q NEARBY AT Jim's Home..

Bring your chairs and some unique food..


DETAILS AND DRIVING DIRECTIONS/MAPS  will be GIVEN OUT AT BOLTON LAKE ..

(its not the best thing to give out home addresses on the net).

-----------------------------------------------

For boats,  Most Likely i will bring all of them but put in the water the following for the actual self rescue practice:

~~> Eddyline --  its easy to learn in this one

~~~> The Greenlander Pro just to see if you are now proficient enough for a real sea kayak

 

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing an "ORANGE safety HAT" at the boat ramp area

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: JUNE 23 -- KAYAK SELF RESCUE PRACTICE FOR ALL--- Pot Luck BBQ@ Jim's Home Nearby
